label: 宋之問
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (?656-712). Generally seen as a poet who marks the transition from Early to High Tang and as one of the most important forefunners of the sudden prominence of shi poetry in the following century.
